title: Energy consumption by source, by region
description: This chart shows where the countries/regions get their energy from – coal, oil, gas, nuclear energy, or renewables. Energy consumption is shown per region, per year, in terawatt-hours (TWh).
source: Hannah Ritchie, Max Roser and Pablo Rosado (2020) - "CO₂ and Greenhouse Gas Emissions". Published online at ourworldindata.org.
